name: Angelic Blessing
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

name: Durkwood Boars
flavor_text:
"And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine: and the herd ran violently . . . ."
—*The Bible*, Mark 5:13

name: Eager Cadet
flavor_text: The enthusiasm of the young, sharpened by the discipline of a soldier.

name: Giant Octopus
flavor_text: At the sight of the thing the calamari vendor's eyes went wide, but from fear or avarice none could tell.

name: Hand of Death
flavor_text: The touch of death is never gentle.

name: Knight Errant
flavor_text:
". . . Before honor is humility."
—*The Bible*, Proverbs 15:33

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Meant to cut through the body and burn straight to the soul.

name: Mons's Goblin Raiders
flavor_text: Just because they have a club doesn't mean they're organized.

name: Monstrous Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The nightstalkers' little game of tease-the-squirrel suddenly took an unexpected turn.

name: Royal Falcon
flavor_text: Hunter by instinct, weapon by training.

name: Sea Eagle
flavor_text: Where air meets water, fish meets talon.

name: Time Ebb
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

name: Wild Griffin
flavor_text: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

name: Willow Elf
flavor_text: The forest lives in the elf as the elf lives in the forest.
